Excellent: Response demonstrates an in-depth reflection on, and personalization of, the theories, concepts, and/or strategies presented in the course materials to date. Viewpoints and interpretations are insightful and well supported. Clear, detailed examples are provided, as applicable.
Good: Response demonstrates a thoughtful reflection on, and personalization of, the theories, concepts, and/or strategies presented in the course materials to date. Viewpoints and interpretations are generally supported.  Appropriate examples are genterally provided, as applicable.
Above Expectations: Response demonstrates a limited reflection on, and personalization of, the theories, concepts, and/or strategies presented in the course materials to date. Viewpoints and interpretations are sometimes usupported.  Appropriate examples are provided, as applicable.
Meets Expectations: Response demonstrates a minimal reflection on, and personalization of, the theories, concepts, and/or strategies presented in the course materials to date. Some viewpoints and interpretations are unsupported or supported with flawed arguments. Some examples, when applicable, are not provided or are irrelevant to the assignment.
Below Expectations: Response demonstrates a lack of reflection on, or personalization of, the theories, concepts, and/or strategies presented in the course materials to date. Viewpoints and interpretations are missing, inappropriate, and/or unsupported. Examples, when applicable, are not provided.

Excellent: Writing is clear, concise, and well organized with excellent sentence/paragraph construction. Thoughts are expressed in a coherent and logical manner. There are no more than three spelling, grammar, or syntax errors.
Good: Writing is mostly clear, concise, and well organized with good sentence/paragraph construction. Thoughts are expressed in a coherent and logical manner. There are no more than five spelling, grammar, or syntax errors.
Above Expectations: Writing is sometimes unclear and/or disorganized. Thoughts are not always expressed in a logical manner. There are more than five spelling, grammar, or syntax errors.
Meets Expectations: Writing is unclear and/or disorganized. Thoughts are not expressed in a logical manner. There are more than five spelling, grammar, or syntax errors.
Below Expectations: Writing is unclear and disorganized. Thoughts ramble and make little sense. There are numerous spelling, grammar, or syntax errors throughout the response.
